title: Cheese Dip
directions: In a shallow baking dish, place all of the ingredients and microwave on high for 2 minutes.
Stir the mixture well to combine and bake in a preheated oven to 350Â° for 20 minutes.
Easy, peasy and cheesy! I serve this with wheat thins or fritos scoops for dipping. Feel free to serve it with whatever you like, it will still taste good!
ingredients: 2 cups of grated cheddar cheese or Jalapeno jack.
